footer.description: Keeviqo is a personal information management platform that helps you organize all your documents, reminders, and important information in one place.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Keeviqo's mission is to simplify personal information management and reduce the mental load of managing documents, reminders, and important information. We believe that everyone deserves tools to help them organize their lives efficiently and intuitively.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where personal information management is simple, secure, and accessible to everyone. Keeviqo is designed to be the most comprehensive platform for managing all aspects of personal life, from health and finances to legal documents and family memories.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Keeviqo was founded out of personal frustration with the scattered nature of important information. Our founders experienced the challenges of managing documents, reminders, and personal information, and decided to create a comprehensive solution that addresses the needs of people in all walks of life.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Error sending message. Please try again later.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how Keeviqo collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.description: We collect personal information when you register for the service, use the application, or contact our support.

use.title: Information Use
use.description: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and send you important updates.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with service providers who help us operate the service.

security.title: Information Security
security.description: We take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze site usage, and personalize content and advertisements.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to access, correct, delete, and object to processing.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through a prominent notice on the site or by email.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at keeviqo.contact@gmail.com.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.introduction: These Terms of Use constitute a legal agreement between you and Keeviqo.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using Keeviqo services, you agree to these terms.

account.title: User Account
account.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and for all activities that occur under your account.

use.title: Service Use
use.description: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.

content.title: User Content
content.description: You retain all rights to the content you upload to the service, but grant us a license to use it to provide the service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your access to the service for any reason, including breach of these terms.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: The service is provided 'as is' and 'as available', without warranties of any kind.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: In no event shall Keeviqo be liable for indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may change these terms at any time. Your continued use of the service after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.noResults: No results found for your search.

items.a1: Keeviqo is a personal information management platform that helps you organize all your documents, reminders, and important information in one place. It offers 72 different life categories, each with unique features tailored to the specific needs of that area.
items.a2: Keeviqo offers a basic free plan with limited access to features. Premium plans are available with more storage, advanced features, and improved support.
items.q3: How does Keeviqo keep my information secure?
items.a3: We use advanced encryption, two-factor authentication, and additional security methods to protect your information. All data is stored on secure servers with regular backups.
items.q4: Can I share information with others?
items.a4: Yes, Keeviqo allows you to share specific documents and information with family, friends, or professionals. You control who can see what and for how long.
items.q5: What happens if I lose access to my account?
items.a5: Keeviqo offers account recovery options, including password reset email and the option to set up emergency contacts who can help you regain access if needed.
items.q6: Can I export my data from Keeviqo?
items.a6: Yes, you can export all your data at any time in common formats like PDF, CSV, or ZIP.
items.q7: Does Keeviqo work on all devices?
items.a7: Yes, Keeviqo is a responsive platform that works on computers, tablets, and mobile phones. We also have dedicated apps for iOS and Android.
items.q8: How can I get help if I have a problem?
items.a8: You can contact our support through the 'Contact Us' form, email keeviqo.contact@gmail.com, or chat with a support representative during business hours.

generator.title: Create QR Code
generator.description: Enter text or URL to create a custom QR code.

error.generation: Error generating QR code. Please try again.

howto.title: How to Use QR Codes
howto.step1: 1. Enter the text, URL, or other information you want to encode.
howto.step2: 2. Click 'Generate QR Code' to create the code.
howto.step3: 3. Download the QR code or share it directly.
howto.step4: 4. Others can scan the code with any standard QR scanner.

tips.title: Useful Tips
tips.item1: Use shorter URLs for easier-to-scan QR codes.
tips.item2: Test your QR code with several different scanners to ensure it works properly.
tips.item3: Print QR codes large enough to be easily scanned.
